quest.name: Stock and Barrel
journal:
 Quest Sync
The guard quartermaster seems a bit overwhelmed.
objectives: Search for usable supplies at the Northern Staging Point.
Deliver the knobbly cane to the guard quartermaster.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: I hate to be abrupt, but─can you help me?

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Thank y─ Oh goodness, it's you! The one who turned the tide at Holminster Switch! Well, I feel doubly bad about this now, but I have little choice. I need any help that I can get.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Thanks to the eaters, everything not in ruins is in disarray, and I'm working to determine what materiel we have, but that requires sifting through it all! And if I don't know what we need it will be fruitless, as I won't be able to order, and─

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Ahem. In short, I need you to meet me at the Northern Staging Point. Please.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: We'll be assessing the situation out here. Though it may save time if you were to first tell me what destruction you personally witnessed?

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Many structures burned or otherwise damaged in the fighting... Yes, I thought as much. I may look into procuring tents so that the laborers come to assist in the reconstruction need not journey back and forth each day─that ought to save time.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: I'd be curious to know whether anything out here actually has survived. Might I ask you to survey the northern area and tell me if you find any materiel or other supplies that might still be fit for use?

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Thank you. Please meet me here when you've finished.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You pick up the cane, and see that it has been weathered by what must have been many years of use.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You peer into the crate to find that it, fortuitously, contains several undamaged tents.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You examine the rack, and notice that many of the weapons that remain are, as yet, undamaged.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Finished your inspection, have you? What did you find?

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Oh, shepherds around here use this sort of cane. It must belong to one of the residents. Or former residents, now, I suppose...

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: We can return it to them, though I imagine they'd rather have their land and livestock back. What else was there?

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Good to hear that I shouldn't need to procure any fresh tents. The weapons are less immediately useful, though I will of course have them collected. It seems that I'll primarily need to order tools, as there were none to be found in the areas I checked, either.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: I very much appreciate your help─this has gone much more swiftly for your presence. Would you accept a small reward? I have a bit of coin stored for just such an occasion back at the fort.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: And now the real work begins. Fighting off the sin eaters was no small feat, but the task of rebuilding seems almost more daunting.

dialogue.name: SUPPLYOFFICER03881
dialogue.text: Nothing for it but to grit our teeth and get to it, however. For the sake of everyone in Lakeland.
